description: |-
  This resource can manage the IPSLA configuration.

# iosxr_ipsla (Resource)

This resource can manage the IPSLA configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_ipsla" "example" {
  low_memory = 100000
  key_chain  = "KEY_CHAIN"
  operations = [
    {
      operation_number                                 = 1
      udp_echo                                         = true
      udp_echo_tag                                     = "UDP_ECHO_TAG"
      udp_echo_frequency                               = 60
      udp_echo_datasize_request                        = 64
      udp_echo_timeout                                 = 5000
      udp_echo_source_ipv4                             = "10.1.1.1"
      udp_echo_source_port                             = 1024
      udp_echo_destination_ipv4                        = "10.1.1.2"
      udp_echo_destination_port                        = 7
      udp_echo_control_disable                         = false
      udp_echo_verify_data                             = false
      udp_echo_tos                                     = 0
      udp_echo_vrf                                     = "VRF1"
      udp_echo_statistics_hourly_buckets               = 2
      udp_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_count    = 1
      udp_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_interval = 20
      udp_echo_statistics_intervals = [
        {
          interval = 300
          buckets  = 10
        }
      ]
      udp_echo_history_buckets    = 15
      udp_echo_history_filter_all = true
      udp_echo_history_lives      = 2
    }
  ]
  schedules = [
    {
      operation_number   = 1
      life_time          = 86200
      start_hour         = 12
      start_minute       = 0
      start_second       = 0
      start_month        = "january"
      start_day_of_month = 15
      start_year         = 2032
      start_pending      = false
      recurring          = true
      ageout             = 300
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `key_chain` (String) Use MD5 authentication for IPSLA control message
- `low_memory` (Number) Configure low memory water mark (default 20M)
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `operations` (Attributes List) Operation number (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--operations))
- `schedules` (Attributes List) Specify an operation (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--schedules))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--operations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `operations`

Required:

- `operation_number` (Number) Operation number
  - Range: `1`-`2048`

Optional:

- `icmp_echo` (Boolean) ICMP echo operation type
- `icmp_echo_datasize_request` (Number) Enter request datasize in byte
  - Range: `0`-`16384`
- `icmp_echo_destination_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the target device
- `icmp_echo_destination_ipv6` (String) Enter IPv6 address of the target device
- `icmp_echo_frequency` (Number) Frequency of the probing
  - Range: `1`-`604800`
- `icmp_echo_history_buckets` (Number) Buckets of history kept
  - Range: `1`-`60`
- `icmp_echo_history_filter_all` (Boolean) Store history data for all operations
- `icmp_echo_history_filter_failures` (Boolean) Store data for operations that failed
- `icmp_echo_history_lives` (Number) Lives of history kept
  - Range: `0`-`2`
- `icmp_echo_source_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the source device
- `icmp_echo_source_ipv6` (String) Enter IPv6 address of the source device
- `icmp_echo_statistics_hourly_buckets` (Number) Number of Hours for which statistics are kept
  - Range: `0`-`25`
- `icmp_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_count` (Number) Count of distribution intervals maintained
  - Range: `1`-`20`
- `icmp_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_interval` (Number) Time interval for each statistical distribution
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `icmp_echo_statistics_intervals` (Attributes List) Statistics collection over specified time interval (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--operations--icmp_echo_statistics_intervals))
- `icmp_echo_tag` (String) Add a tag for this operation
- `icmp_echo_timeout` (Number) Probe timeout interval
  - Range: `1`-`604800000`
- `icmp_echo_tos` (Number) Type of service setting in probe packet
  - Range: `0`-`255`
- `icmp_echo_vrf` (String) Configure IPSLA for a VPN Routing/Forwarding instance
- `icmp_path_echo` (Boolean) ICMP path-echo operation type
- `icmp_path_echo_datasize_request` (Number) Enter request datasize in byte
  - Range: `0`-`16384`
- `icmp_path_echo_destination_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the target device
- `icmp_path_echo_frequency` (Number) Frequency of the probing
  - Range: `1`-`604800`
- `icmp_path_echo_history_buckets` (Number) Buckets of history kept
  - Range: `1`-`60`
- `icmp_path_echo_history_filter_all` (Boolean) Store history data for all operations
- `icmp_path_echo_history_filter_failures` (Boolean) Store data for operations that failed
- `icmp_path_echo_history_lives` (Number) Lives of history kept
  - Range: `0`-`2`
- `icmp_path_echo_history_samples` (Number) Samples of history kept
  - Range: `1`-`30`
- `icmp_path_echo_source_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the source device
- `icmp_path_echo_statistics_hourly_buckets` (Number) Number of Hours for which statistics are kept
  - Range: `0`-`25`
- `icmp_path_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_count` (Number) Count of distribution intervals maintained
  - Range: `1`-`20`
- `icmp_path_echo_statistics_hourly_distribution_interval` (Number) Time interval for each statistical distribution
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `icmp_path_echo_statistics_hourly_maximum_hops` (Number) Maximum hops per path for which statistics are kept
  - Range: `1`-`30`
- `icmp_path_echo_statistics_hourly_maximum_paths` (Number) Maximum number of paths for which statistics are kept
  - Range: `1`-`128`
- `icmp_path_echo_tag` (String) Add a tag for this operation
- `icmp_path_echo_timeout` (Number) Probe timeout interval
  - Range: `1`-`604800000`
- `icmp_path_echo_tos` (Number) Type of service setting in probe packet
  - Range: `0`-`255`
- `icmp_path_jitter` (Boolean) ICMP path-jitter operation type
- `icmp_path_jitter_datasize_request` (Number) Enter request datasize in byte
  - Range: `0`-`16384`
- `icmp_path_jitter_destination_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the target device
- `icmp_path_jitter_frequency` (Number) Frequency of the probing
  - Range: `1`-`604800`
- `icmp_path_jitter_packet_count` (Number) Number of packets to be transmitted during a probe
  - Range: `1`-`100`
- `icmp_path_jitter_packet_interval` (Number) Inter packet interval
  - Range: `1`-`60000`
- `icmp_path_jitter_source_ipv4` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the source device
- `icmp_path_jitter_tag` (String) Add a tag for this operation
- `icmp_path_jitter_timeout` (Number) Probe timeout interval
  - Range: `1`-`604800000`

  - Range: `0`-`255`

  - Range: `1`-`20`
- `mpls_lsp_ping_statistics_hourly_distribution_interval` (Number) Time interval for each statistical distribution

- `mpls_lsp_ping_tag` (String) Add a tag for this operation
- `mpls_lsp_ping_target_ipv4` (String) Target FEC address with mask
- `mpls_lsp_ping_target_ipv4_mask` (String) Target FEC address with mask
- `mpls_lsp_ping_target_pseudowire_address` (String) Pseudowire target
- `mpls_lsp_ping_target_pseudowire_vc_id` (Number) Virtual Circuit ID
  - Range: `1`-`4294967295`
- `mpls_lsp_ping_target_te_tunnel` (Number) TE tunnel interface
  - Range: `0`-`65535`

  - Range: `1`-`604800000`

  - Range: `0`-`65535`

  - Range: `1`-`604800000`
- `udp_echo` (Boolean) UDP echo operation type

  - Range: `16`-`1500`

  - Range: `1`-`604800000`
- `udp_echo_tos` (Number) Type of service setting in probe packet
  - Range: `0`-`255`
- `udp_echo_verify_data` (Boolean) Check each IPSLA response for corruption
- `udp_echo_vrf` (String) Configure IPSLA for a VPN Routing/Forwarding instance

<a id="nestedatt--schedules"></a>
### Nested Schema for `schedules`

Required:

- `operation_number` (Number) Specify an operation
  - Range: `1`-`2048`

Optional:

- `ageout` (Number) How long to keep this entry after it becomes inactive
  - Range: `0`-`2073600`
- `life_forever` (Boolean) Schedule operation to run indefinitely
- `life_time` (Number) Life in seconds. (default 3600 seconds)
  - Range: `1`-`2147483647`
- `recurring` (Boolean) probe to be scheduled automatically every day
- `start_after_hour` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
  - Range: `0`-`23`
- `start_after_minute` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
  - Range: `0`-`59`
- `start_after_second` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
  - Range: `0`-`59`
- `start_day_of_month` (Number) Day of the month
  - Range: `1`-`31`
- `start_hour` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
  - Range: `0`-`23`
- `start_minute` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
  - Range: `0`-`59`
- `start_month` (String) Month of the year
  - Choices: `april`, `august`, `december`, `february`, `january`, `july`, `june`, `march`, `may`, `november`, `october`, `september`
- `start_now` (Boolean) Schedule operation now
- `start_pending` (Boolean) Keep operation in the pending state
- `start_second` (Number) Time in hh:mm:ss format
  - Range: `0`-`59`
- `start_year` (Number) Year
  - Range: `1993`-`2035`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_ipsla.example ""
```
